review: This has been a hate/love relationship - yesterday it would have been 1 star - last night 5.  I hope that people that have cable read this because so far that seems to be my fix.  I initially had to go through a couple of tech support calls which helped somewhat but no one was able to tell me why the streaming kept cutting out.  I could not watch more than 2 minutes without it cutting out and the screen going dark - sometimes it came back, other times it said I did not have a connection.  I tried a Chromecast which was no better (I think it is worse since it doesn't have a remote).  One of the IT guys at work found an app so I could see what kind of network traffic I had.  To make a long story short, my last resort (which I didn't think would work) was to turn the cable box and the TV on and then change HDMI1 to HDMI2.  That did it - works like a charm (so far).  The point being that no one told me to turn the cable box on and a couple of my IT guys said that that should not make a difference - but it does.  I live in SE Pennsylvania and I have Comcast as my cable provider and ISP.
